properties.name: ksql.server.wakeUpRate
properties.description: Rate of waking up sql query

properties.name: debezium.name
properties.description: Unique name for the connector. Attempting to register again with the same name will fail. (This property is required by all Kafka Connect connectors.)

properties.name: debezium.connector.class
properties.description: The name of the Java class for the connector. Always use a value of io.debeziumâ€‹.connector.oracle.OracleConnector for the Oracle connector

properties.name: debezium.tasks.max
properties.description: The maximum number of tasks that should be created for this connector. The Oracle connector always uses a single task and therefore does not use this value, so the default is always acceptable.

properties.name: debezium.database.hostname
properties.description: IP address or hostname of the Oracle database server.

properties.name: debezium.database.user
properties.description: Name of the user to use when connecting to the Oracle database server.

properties.name: debezium.database.port
properties.description: Integer port number of the Oracle database server.

properties.name: debezium.database.password
properties.description: Password to use when connecting to the Oracle database server.

properties.name: debezium.database.server.name
properties.description: Logical name that identifies and provides a namespace for the particular Oracle database server being monitored. The logical name should be unique across all other connectors, since it is used as a prefix for all Kafka topic names emanating from this connector. Only alphanumeric characters and underscores should be used.

properties.name: debezium.database.connection.adapter
properties.description: The adapter implementation to use. xstream uses the Oracle XStreams API. logminer uses the native Oracle LogMiner API.

properties.name: debezium.database.dbname
properties.description: Name of the database to connect to. Must be the CDB name when working with the CDB + PDB model.

properties.name: debezium.database.pdb.name
properties.description: Name of the PDB to connect to, when working with the CDB + PDB model.

properties.name: debezium.table.include.list
properties.description: An optional comma-separated list of regular expressions that match fully-qualified table identifiers for tables to be monitored; any table not included in the include list will be excluded from monitoring. Each identifier is of the form schemaName.tableName. By default the connector will monitor every non-system table in each monitored database. May not be used with table.exclude.list.
